name: Politics and Violence: Spot the Difference
description: This course aims to develop a critical approach to the study of violence. We will examine the linkages between politics and crime, between violence and democracy and the political context of specific forms of violence, such as vigilantism, state, collective and, structural violence. [24L]
exclusions: SOC346H5 Special Topics in Crime and Law: Politics and Violence: Spot the Difference (Fall 2017, Winter 2018)
